# Nuxt UI Pro - Docs template

> A template for building documentation with Nuxt UI Pro and Nuxt Content

## Documentation Sets

- [Nuxt UI Pro - Docs template Full Documentation](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev//llms-full.txt): This is the full documentation for the Nuxt UI Pro - Docs template

## Getting Started

- [Introduction](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/getting-started): Welcome to nuxt-applicationinsights documentation
- [Installation](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/getting-started/installation): Get started with Applicationinsights for Nuxt
- [Usage](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/getting-started/configuration): Learn how to write and customize your documentation.
- [How does it work](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/getting-started/how-does-it-work)
- [Hooks](https://docs-template.nuxt.dev/getting-started/hooks)
